title: De Graankorrel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Macrobiotic, Beer/Wine, Bakery, European, Dutch
description: Offers a daily changing lunch menu in small or large portion; plus soup of the day or miso soup. Desserts are organic and vegan without added sugar. Drinks include organic juices, beer, wine, coffee, tea, or water. Nice setting in a house-like place with fireplace.
